story.title: Our Story
story.content1: VanarSena was established in 2020 by a group of people who wanted to bring positive change in society. Our name is inspired by the devoted followers of Lord Hanuman "VanarSena", who are symbols of selfless service and dedication.
story.content2: Today we have 25+ active volunteers working in various fields. We have served 500+ people so far and organized 50+ successful programs.

purpose.title: Our Purpose
purpose.content: "Reaching every section of society and serving those in need is our main objective. We believe that big changes can be brought about through small efforts."

missionVision.title: Mission and Vision
missionItems: Serving the weaker sections of society

visionItems: Building a just and equal society
Access to education and health for all
